text: “Ndipo pamene gulu lina mwa iwo lidanena: “E inu nzika za mu Yathiriba (Madina)! Palibe njira kwa inu yokhalira (pa nkhondo yogonjayi). Choncho bwererani (ku nyumba zanu; msiyeni Muhammad alimbane yekha ndi adani ake).” Ndipo gulu lina la nkhondo lochokera mwa iwo limapempha chilolezo kwa Mneneri (s.a.w) ( chobwelera ku Madina) ponena (kuti): “Ndithu nyumba zathu nzamaliseche (zopanda chitetezo).” Koma izo sizamaliseche. Sakufuna china, koma kuthawa basi
